HomePage.title: Connect, Share, and Learn About Your Pets
HomePage.subtitle: Join a vibrant community of pet owners. Share your pet's adventures, discover care tips, and connect with fellow animal lovers.
HomePage.happeningInCommunity: Here's what's happening in your pet community
HomePage.noFollowingPosts: No posts from accounts you follow yet
HomePage.everythingYouNeed: Everything You Need for Your Pet Community
HomePage.discoverFeatures: Discover features designed for pet lovers
HomePage.petProfilesDesc: Create detailed profiles for each of your pets. Share their photos, stories, and milestones with the community.
HomePage.petCareWikiDesc: Access comprehensive guides on pet care, health, training, and nutrition. Learn from experts and experienced pet owners.
HomePage.socialFeaturesDesc: Follow other pet owners, like and comment on posts, and build connections with people who share your love for animals.
HomePage.messagePrivacyDesc: Keep sensitive conversations secure with automatic end-to-end encryption for direct messages and shared attachments.
HomePage.createAccountToday: Create your account today and start sharing your pet's amazing journey
HomePage.socialNetworkForPetLovers: The Social Network for Pet Lovers

Create.formTitle: Share a resource with your group
Create.formDescription: Provide helpful links, files, or notes that your community can access.

typeDescriptions.link: Share an external article, document, or video
typeDescriptions.note: Create an internal note for members

Create.tagsPlaceholder: Add a keyword and press Enter
Create.tagsHelper: Use up to 10 short tags to help members find this resource.
Create.accessDeniedDescription: You must be signed in to add resources to this group.
Create.permissionDeniedDescription: Only group members can share resources.

errors.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 3 characters long
errors.urlRequired: A valid URL is required for this resource type
errors.tooManyTags: You can add up to 10 tags
errors.tagTooLong: Tags must be 24 characters or fewer
